title: Studio Battaglia
overview: Studio Battaglia is the most prestigious divorce law firm in Milan. Anna, daughter of Marina and sister of Nina and Viola, works there and decides to accept a new job at the Zander studio where she meets Massimo again, who had made her heart beat during her university days. Was accepting this job the right choice? But the women of the Battaglia family are united by a very deep love and an invincible irony that has always saved them, even when everything seemed to be collapsing.
